template.name: idjango
template.value:
import os import sys
# Django 环境设置 ================================================================== # 网站路径 SITE_PATH = r'D:\my\www 2018 优化测试' # 网站设置文件 SETTINGS_FILE = "mysite.settings" sys.path.extend([SITE_PATH, r'D:\mpy\bin', ]) os.environ.setdefault("DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE", SETTINGS_FILE) import django
django.setup() # ------------------------------------------------------------------ Django 环境设置 $END$

template.name: main
isavexlsx
template.value: from openpyxl.workbook import Workbook wb = Workbook() ws = wb.active ws.append([1, 2, 3]) wb.save('保存内容到xlsx文件.xlsx')
template.description: 保存内容到 xlsx 文件
